0.name: Flower Pick
0.fullDesc: Tosses 1 jade tile from the suit with the fewest tiles in hand to deal Quantum DMG equal to <orangeStrong>{{1}}%</orangeStrong> of Qingque's ATK to a single enemy.
0.shortDesc: Tosses a tile to deal minor Quantum DMG to a single enemy.

1.name: Cherry on Top!
1.fullDesc: Deals Quantum DMG equal to <orangeStrong>{{1}}%</orangeStrong> of Qingque's ATK to a single enemy, and deals Quantum DMG equal to <orangeStrong>{{2}}%</orangeStrong> of Qingque's ATK to enemies adjacent to it.\n"Cherry on Top!" cannot recover Skill Points.
1.shortDesc: Deals Quantum DMG to a single enemy and minor Quantum DMG to enemies adjacent to it.

0.name: A Scoop of Moon
0.fullDesc: Immediately draws {{1}} jade tile(s) and increases DMG by <orangeStrong>{{2}}%</orangeStrong> until the end of the current turn. This effect can stack up to {{3}} time(s). The turn will not end after this Skill is used.
0.shortDesc: <orangeStrong>Draws tiles</orangeStrong> and increases DMG dealt. <orangeStrong>This turn does not end</orangeStrong> after this action.

0.name: A Quartet? Woo-hoo!
0.fullDesc: Deals Quantum DMG equal to <orangeStrong>{{1}}%</orangeStrong> of Qingque's ATK to all enemies, and obtains 4 jade tiles of the same suit.
0.shortDesc: Deals Quantum DMG to all enemies, then obtains 4 tiles of the same suit.

0.name: Game Solitaire
0.fullDesc: After using Technique, Qingque draws {{1}} jade tile(s) when the battle starts.
0.shortDesc: After they use their Technique, draw tile(s) at the start of the next battle.

0.name: Attack
0.fullDesc: Attacks an enemy, and when the battle starts, reduces their Toughness of the corresponding Type.

2.name: Sleep on the Tiles
2.desc: Every time Draw Tile is triggered, Qingque immediately regenerates {{1}} Energy.

3.name: Read Between the Tiles
3.desc: Ultimate Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.\nTalent Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.

4.name: Right on the Tiles
4.desc: After using Skill, there is a {{1}}% fixed chance to gain Self-Sufficer, lasting until the end of the current turn. \nWith Self-Sufficer, using Basic ATK or Enhanced Basic ATK immediately launches 1 follow-up attack on the same target, dealing Quantum DMG equal to 100% of Basic ATK DMG or Enhanced Basic ATK DMG.

5.name: Gambit for the Tiles
5.desc: Skill Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.\nBasic ATK Lv. +1, up to a maximum of Lv. 10.

6.name: Prevail Beyond the Tiles
6.desc: Recovers 1 Skill Point after using Enhanced Basic ATK.
